title: Bitcoin, Ether, XRP Slide as December Begins With 'Yearn Incident'
contentSnippet: Major cryptocurrencies traded lower in early Asia as DeFi platform Yearn noted at "incident" in its yETH pool.

title: 中国人民銀行、仮想通貨取引の厳格取締を改めて要請、ステーブルコインも警戒対象
contentSnippet: 中国人民銀行が仮想通貨取引の取締強化を改めて各当局に要請した。仮想通貨関連活動の再活発化が背景にあるとみられ、ステーブルコインも警戒対象としている。

title: コインシェアーズ、XRP・ソラナ・ライトコインのETF申請を取り下げ
contentSnippet: 欧州大手のコインシェアーズが、XRP・ソラナ・ライトコインのETF申請を取り下げた。米国市場での大手運用会社への集中により、差別化や利益率確保が困難になるとの懸念を示し、ナスダック上場を控え、仮想通貨関連株式やアクティブ運用戦略など新商品の投入を計画している。

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: What 'mNAV' Really Means for Bitcoin Treasury Companies — and Where It Falls Short
contentSnippet: NYDIG’s research head questions how mNAV is used to assess bitcoin treasuries, arguing it masks key risks tied to capital structure and equity dilution.

title: Telegram's Pavel Durov: Cocoon decentralized AI network now live
contentSnippet: The privacy-preserving decentralized AI platform is built on top of The Open Network, and users earn TON for renting out computing power.

title: Tether CEO slams S&P ratings agency and influencers spreading USDt FUD
contentSnippet: The comments followed S&P's downgrade of USDt's ability to maintain its peg, which cited Tether's Bitcoin and gold reserves as a concern.

title: Priced at Zero: How Brazil’s Méliuz Turned to Bitcoin to Escape a Treasury Trap
contentSnippet: The company adopted a bitcoin treasury plan by deploying a strategy inspired by Metaplanet, with 66% shareholder approval, to mitigate negative returns from government bonds.

title: The Biggest Games Releasing in December 2025
contentSnippet: There are a few more big games releasing before the year's up, including Metroid Prime 4: Beyond and Marvel Cosmic Invasion.

title: Most Ethereum valuation models indicate ETH is undervalued: Analyst
contentSnippet: Although most models projected ETH prices above $4,000, one critical valuation model bucked the trend, signaling that ETH may be overvalued.

title: Michael Saylor Sunday Change-Up Suggests New Announcement Coming Monday
contentSnippet: The executive chairman of bitcoin treasury firm Strategy teased a switch from orange dots to green dots in what's become his routine cheeky Sunday X post.

title: I Made an AI Speak Every Century of English—It Ended With a Message From the Year 15,000
contentSnippet: I pushed a chatbot through several millennia of linguistic evolution. An AI from the year 5000 lectured me about pronouns.

title: 'We Wear Your Loathing With Pride': Tether's Downgrade at S&P Sparks Online Battle
contentSnippet: S&P Global last Wednesday slashed its rating on Tether's USDT stablecoin to its weakest score.

title: Ethereum Developers Prep for Fusaka, Second Upgrade of 2025
contentSnippet: The goal of the upgrade is to enable Ethereum to handle the large transaction throughput from the layer-2 chains that use the blockchain as their base layer.

title: Is the Bitcoin Digital Asset Treasury Model Broken? Architect Partners Says No
contentSnippet: A sharp market pullback has exposed which BTC-focused public companies can actually execute, and which were never built for volatility.

title: Fed rate-cut bets surge: Can Bitcoin finally break $91K to go higher?
contentSnippet: Bitcoin price stayed stuck near $91,000 due to weak ETF flows and cautious derivatives as stocks and gold rallied on rising rate-cut bets.

title: Bitcoin 2022 bear market correlation hits 98% as ETFs add $220M
contentSnippet: New research showed BTC price action on course to copy the 2022 bear market while risk-asset inflows showed signs of a bullish turnaround.

title: Strategy will sell Bitcoin as ‘last resort’ if mNAV drops, capital is unavailable: CEO
contentSnippet: Strategy CEO Phong Le says Bitcoin would only be sold if the company’s stock falls below net asset value and funding options disappear, calling it a financial decision.

title: BlackRock exec says ‘perfectly normal’ as IBIT sees $2.3B outflows in Nov
contentSnippet: BlackRock says $2.34 billion in November outflows from IBIT are normal as demand once pushed the ETF near $100 billion.

title: ETH may reclaim $3.2K soon, based on low stablecoin yields: Santiment
contentSnippet: Stablecoin yields not being overly high suggests the market hasn’t reached a “major top” and Ether may reach $3,200 in the near term, according to Santiment.

title: 今週の主要仮想通貨材料まとめ、金持ち父さん著者キヨサキのBTC売却やソラナとXRPのETFの好調など
contentSnippet: 前週比で振り返る仮想通貨市場の最新動向。ビットコインやイーサリアム、XRP、ソラナなど主要銘柄の騰落率や注目材料を一挙紹介。市場トレンドと関連ニュースを詳しく解説する。

title: DeFiで株式市場はどう変わる？　Progmat齊藤達哉氏が語るオンチェーン金融の未来｜独占インタビュー【後編】
contentSnippet: Progmat齊藤達哉氏インタビュー後編。議決権付きトークン化株式で日本が世界初となる理由、2028年施行を目指すトークン化法のロードマップ、DeFi・AIエージェントを見据えた将来ビジョンを聞いた。

title: 週刊仮想通貨ニュース｜個人マイナーのビットコイン採掘成功やアップビットの約48億円の不正流出に高い関心
contentSnippet: 今週は、個人マイナーのビットコイン採掘成功、JPモルガンによる仮想通貨業界関係者の口座の連続閉鎖、アップビットの約48億円の不正流出に関する記事が関心を集めた。

title: Nasdaq crypto chief pledges to ‘move as fast as we can’ on tokenized stocks
contentSnippet: Nasdaq’s head of digital assets strategy, Matt Savarese, said the stock exchange is ready to answer any questions the SEC may have for its proposal for tokenized stocks.

title: Bitcoin ETFs Are Now BlackRock’s Top Revenue Source, Exec Says
contentSnippet: The firm's US-listed spot bitcoin ETF IBIT, launched in January 2024, reached $70 billion in assets in record time and has generated hundreds of millions in fees.

title: Meet the Billion-Dollar Crypto Founder Who Started Trading at 9 Years Old
contentSnippet: Denis Dariotis, the youthful founder and CEO of cryptocurrency-focused trading software firm GoQuant, talks about building a billion-dollar-a-day trading startup during his formative years.

title: Strategy CEO: Equity and Debt Flexibility Power Long-Term Bitcoin Accumulation Plan
contentSnippet: Phong Le says Strategy has no near-term debt maturity risk and plans to continue using convertibles and equity to grow its bitcoin position over time.

title: UK Budget Confirms New Crypto Reporting Rules from January 1
contentSnippet: The UK government expects to raise $417 million in extra tax as UK-registered crypto exchanges are required to record customer details.

title: 米賭けサイトカルシ、無免許スポーツ賭博運営で提訴
contentSnippet: ブルームバーグによると米賭け市場のカルシが無免許でスポーツ賭博を運営し、マーケットメイキング手法について顧客を誤解させたとして集団訴訟を起こされた。共同創設者は主張を否定。

title: ブラックロック、債券ファンドでビットコインETF「IBIT」を買い増し
contentSnippet: ブラックロックが7～9月期に債券ファンドで自社ビットコインETF「IBIT」を買い増していた。9月末時点で1.5億ドル相当を保有。ビットコイン現物ETFへの流入はここ数日復活傾向だ。

title: 仮想通貨のバイバックとは？2025年注目の6銘柄を解説
contentSnippet: 2025年、仮想通貨業界で総額14億ドル規模に達したバイバック。ハイパーリキッド（HYPE）やパンプファン（PUMP）など、実際にバイバックを実施している6銘柄を徹底解説。株式の自社株買いとの違いや投資リスクもわかりやすく紹介します。

title: 24時間・1円から取引可能に　Progmat齊藤達哉氏が語る「トークン化株式」の全貌｜独占インタビュー【前編】
contentSnippet: Progmat代表・齊藤達哉氏に独占取材。1円単位・24時間取引可能な「トークン化株式」の仕組みと、議決権や優待も得られる投資家メリット、リアルタイム株主把握など発行企業メリットを聞いた。

title: アーサー・ヘイズがビットコイン年末25万ドル予測維持、流動性底打ちと量的引き締め終了を根拠に
contentSnippet: ビットメックス共同創設者アーサー・ヘイズ氏が11月27日、ビットコインの年末25万ドル到達予測を堅持した。先週の8万600ドルを底値とみており、米ドル流動性の底打ちと量的引き締め終了が上昇を牽引すると分析。

title: OpenAI Confirms Data Breach—Here's Who Is Impacted
contentSnippet: OpenAI said a Mixpanel breach exposed API user metadata—and urged customers to watch for phishing attacks.

title: 'Bad Joke': FC Barcelona Criticized for $22 Million Deal with Samoan Crypto Firm ZKP
contentSnippet: A former FC Barcelona board member hit out at the deal with ZKP on social media, highlighting the firm's “unknown” ownership.

title: Stablecoin Giant Tether to Shutter Uruguay Bitcoin Mining Operation
contentSnippet: USDT stablecoin issuer Tether is halting its Bitcoin mining operations in Uruguay due to high energy costs, local media has reported.

title: BitMine and Bitcoin Miners' Stocks Surge as BTC, Ethereum Recover
contentSnippet: Crypto-related equities like BitMine and leading Bitcoin mining stocks are jumping as Bitcoin and Ethereum regain key levels.

title: Myriad Moves: Predictors Turn Bullish on Bitcoin Rebounding to $100K
contentSnippet: Top markets on Myriad this week include predictions on Bitcoin's next price move, whether Brian Armstrong will appear UpOnly, and more.

title: Monero and Zcash Diverge in Double-Digit Weekly Swing as Privacy Coins Rotate
contentSnippet: Monero surged 23% this week on futures speculation while Zcash fell equally, reflecting leverage and timing within the privacy narrative.

title: Trump White House ‘World’s Most Corrupt Crypto Startup Operation’: House Democrats
contentSnippet: President Trump and his family made $800 million from sales of cryptocurrencies in the first half of the year, according to a new report.
